channel.title: Dick Johnson's app & blog site on Dick Johnson
channel.description: Recent content in Dick Johnson's app & blog site on Dick Johnson

item.title: Practice2 1.03 Released for iOS
item.description: Version 1.03 of Practice2, was approved and released for iOS today What’s new Listen to music, or play along to tracks during your practice session. Choose a playlist to listen to during your session. You can chose a different playlist for each session which is saved for future use. Fixed a few bugs New App landing page https://practice2app.firewerkz.dev Use split screen on iPad to follow along with another app, like a song book, or guitar tabs All the best, Dick.

item.title: Practice2 1.03 Released for macOS
item.description: Version 1.03 of Practice2, was approved and released for macOS today What’s new Listen to music, or play along to tracks during your practice session. Choose a playlist to listen to during your session. You can chose a different playlist for each session which is saved for future use. Fixed a few bugs New App landing page https://practice2app.firewerkz.dev Use split screen to follow along with another app, like a song book, or guitar tabs All the best, Dick.

item.title: TimetoGo2 now available for macOS
item.description: TimetoGo2 is now available for macOS Simple Time to Go macOS App. Calculates weeks and days from today to selected dates in the future or past. Includes a lead time date for a given numbers of week from today. Simple. What’s new First macOS release All the best, Dick.

item.description: You should try to find some internet connection to browse here.

item.title: Oops... Page not found.
item.description: You should look somewhere else.

item.title: Practice2 1.02 Released for iOS
item.description: Version 1.02 of Practice2, was approved and released for iOS today What’s new Added configurable time, session phase ending indication. Phase colour turns to yellow Added introduction replay option in setting Fixed a few bugs Use split screen on iPad to follow along with another app, like a song book, or guitar tabs All the best, Dick.

item.title: Practice2 1.02 Released for macOS
item.description: Version 1.02 of Practice2, was approved and released for macOS today What’s new Added configurable time, session phase ending indication. Phase colour turns to yellow Added introduction replay option in setting Fixed a few bugs Use split screen to follow along with another app, like a song book, or guitar tabs All the best, Dick.

item.description: Here are some photos of my local area.

item.title: Boat Trip
item.description: Here are some photos from our recent boat trip.

item.title: TimeToGo Version 1.1 Released for Android
item.description: Version 1.1 of TimeToGo, TtG, was approved and released for Android today. Simple Time to Go App. Calculates the weeks and days from today to a date in the future. Shows the end date for a given numbers of weeks from today. Select an inspiring picture to remind yourself of your goal. Simple. Google Play and the Google Play logo are trademarks of Google LLC.

item.title: About
item.description: Simple apps to make things simple. More to come…

item.title: Car and Bike Photos
item.description: Here are some photos to get things started.

item.title: Practice2 1.01 Released for iOS
item.description: Practice2 release for iPhone & iPad What’s new Added auto reset if session has ended and start is pressed. Add short app intro. Fixed a few bugs. All the best, Dick.

item.title: Practice2 1.01 Released for macOS
item.description: Practice2 release for macOS What’s new Added auto reset if session has ended and start is pressed. Add short app intro. Fixed a few bugs. All the best, Dick.

item.title: Practice2 1.0 Released for iOS
item.description: Practice2 release for iPhone & iPad A simple practice session timer. For example, use it for guitar practice or a health workout session. Create sessions for different purposes and different durations. Share sessions across devices. Share sessions with friends. All the best, Dick.

item.title: Practice2 1.0 Released for macOS
item.description: Practice2 release for macOS A simple practice session timer. For example, use it for guitar practice or a health workout session. Create sessions for different purposes and different durations. Share sessions across devices. Share sessions with friends. All the best, Dick.

item.title: TimetoGo2 1.1.6 Released for iOS
item.description: Version 1.1.6 of TimetoGo2, was approved and released for iOS today Simple Time to Go iOS App. Calculates weeks and days from today to selected dates in the future or past. Includes a lead time date for a given numbers of week from today. Simple. What’s new Fixed a few bugs All the best, Dick.

item.title: TimeToGo Version 1.1 Released
item.description: So today version 1.1 of TimeToGo, TtG, was approved and released. I hope you enjoy the added capability of having the dates in the correct format for your device locale. Fastlane continues to make the process of test and development, as well as app screenshot capture and formatting a breeze. If you haven’t used it, I can thoroughly recommend it. All the best, Dick.

item.title: TimeToGo Updates for Locale
item.description: I know TimeToGo has only just been released, but I’ve been working on the next version, which is now in review. This version display’s the dates and date picker in the correct format for the device’s locale setting. As I’d been working on all the other things needed for the App Store release, I wanted to get the first working version reviewed and released, and then to develop the functionality further, to make the app more useful for more people.

item.title: TimeToGo Released
item.description:
Well today my first app, TimeToGo, TtG, was released.
Originally written for my wife, I hope you find it useful to. Please give me feedback. All the best, Dick.

item.title: Welcome to Firewerkz
item.description:
Just starting my app development journey.
All the best, Dick.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: My Apps are intended for use as is. Your privacy is important to me, and it is my policy to respect your privacy and comply with any applicable laws and regulations regarding personal information. User Data My apps, TtG, TimeToGo, TimetoGo2 and Practice2 do not collect any personal data. Third Party Services My apps do not use any third party services that collect personal data. Children’s Privacy I do not aim my products or services directly at children under the age of 13, and I do not collect personal information about children under 13.
